code: private static String buildMessage(ShardId shardId, String message) {     if (shardId == null) {         return message.     }     return buildMessage(shardId.getIndexName(), shardId.id(), message). }
private static String buildMessage(String index, int shardId, String message) {     return "[" + index + "][" + shardId + "] " + message. }
